name: BitcoinValueinUSDEURGBP
0:
”Alexa, open bitcoin value”
”Alexa, start bitcoin value”
”Alexa, launch bitcoin value”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bitcoin value
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Bitcoin Value in USD/EUR/GBP skill will help you stay informed with the real-time bitcoin value or price in US Dollars, Euros, GB Pounds. The bitcoin price updates in the currency of your choice from the suggestions are just a spell away!

Disclaimer: The prices/value provided are dynamic in nature and work in a 24*7 fashion. The skill reads out current values trending across crypto markets throughout the day and night and users are requested to use it solely for education and information purpose

Note: Other world currency values will be updated in the next version.

For suggestions and queries :
Developer Instagram Handle: yashochitraka
Check out other interesting skills at: https://www.yashochitraka.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
